EmailTemplate.name: Cloud Refresh Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Updating Your Palmetto Home Account
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.Name},
If you are experiencing a data communication error on your Palmetto Home app please take the following steps to refresh your account.
CLICK HERE to login to your dashboard.
Using your credentials please sign into your account.
Logging in on your web browser will refresh your account. If this does not resolve the issue please us know so that we can troubleshoot this issue further.
Thank You,
Palmetto Customer Care Team Email: Customer.care@palmetto.com Phone: 855-339-1831
